Payload_handler
func:
var id = msg.payload.referenceID || 0; //id is an optional parameter
var serviceDescriptions = msg.payload.serviceDescriptions
var start = msg.payload.schedulingStart
var end = msg.payload.schedulingEnd
var expiration = msg.payload.expiration


msg.payload = {
    "referenceID" : id,
    "serviceDescriptions" : serviceDescriptions,
    "schedulingStart" : start, 
    "schedulingEnd" : end, 
    "expiration" : expiration
}

msg.headers = {'content-type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'};
return msg;

setting example values
func:
payload = 
{
    "tuName": "TU_Company1_SRL",   
	"feedIn" : 10,				    //Einspeisung
	"operatingPoint" : 11,	 		//Arbeitspunkt
    "leadingOperatingPoint" : 12,	//vorauseilender Arbeitspunkt
    "currentValueFR" : 13,			//Regelleistungsistwert
	"assignedPool" : 14,			//Poolzuordnung
    "status" : 15,					//Status (Meldung)
	"frequency" : 16,				//Frequenz
	"aFRRsetpoint" : 17,		    //aFRR-Soll (ÜNB -> POOL)
	"aFRRsetpointEcho" : 200,		//aFRR-Soll-Echo (Pool -> ÜNB)
	"setpointFR" : 201,				//Regelleistungs-Soll
	"aFRRGradientPOS" : 202,		//aFRR-Gradient POS
	"aFRRGradientNEG" : 203,		//aFRR-Gradient NEG
	"capacityPOS" : 204,			//Arbeitsvermögen POS (bei begrenztem Energiespeicher)
	"capacityNEG" : 205,			//Arbeitsvermögen NEG (bei begrenzten Energiespeicher)
	"holdingCapacityPOS" : 206,		//Aktuelle Vorhalteleistung POS
	"holdingCapacityNEG" : 207,		//Aktuelle Vorhalteleistung NEG
	"controlBandPOS" : 208,			//Regelband POS
	"controlBandNEG" : 209			//Regelband NEG
}
msg.payload = payload;
return msg;

Payload_handler
Payload description (JSON)
info:
//*****Example payload description *****//
//the payload can be any form of XML the VPP needs for the planning of the TU
//shown in String:
<operation>
    <name>"SchedulingData"</name>
    <tuID>"testTUHSEMD"</tuID>
    <timeWindow>
        <start>"2020-02-18 05:00:00.0"</start>
        <end>"2020-02-18 07:00:00.0"</end>
    </timeWindow>
    <energyRange>
        <from>"6000"</from>
        <till>"22000"</till>
    </energyRange>
</operation>
